geneId.description:
The ID to which the wildtypeExpression ontology term(s) is applied. For this submission,
      these will be genes.

whereExpressedTermIdentifiers.description: For most MODs, this will be a single identifier that represents the 'where' of the expression pattern.  For ZFIN, this will be a set that represent the post-composed 'where' of the expression pattern.

whereExpressedStatement.description: use to provide a human-readable text display for the combination of 1->many ontology terms coded in the whereExpressedTermIdentifiers collection.  For most MODs, this will simply be the term name above.  For ZFIN, this will be a sentence that concantenates the post-composed terms appropriately.

taxonId.description: The taxonId for the species of the gene entity.

dataProvider.description: Constrains the dataProvider to conform to the dataProvider schema.  This schema enforces that a dataProvider provide the taxonId of the record being added, as well as the database source.  see dataProvider.json for more information.

stage.description: the id that represents the stage of the expression annotation

assay.description: the ECO (ontology) id that represents the assay type of the expression, ie: in-situ.

dateAssigned.description: Date this entity was assigned in it's primary data source.
